last_episode_to_air.name: The Beginning
last_episode_to_air.overview: Robert finally comes to terms with his memory loss. Grace and Frankie confront the possibility of immediate death — or aging for a few more years.

name: Grace and Frankie
overview: Elegant, proper Grace and freewheeling, eccentric Frankie are a pair of frenemies whose lives are turned upside down - and permanently intertwined - when their husbands leave them for each other. Together, they must face starting over in their 70s in a 21st century world.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In Season 2 things pick up pretty much right where we left off last year, with Frankie in a guilt-spiraling turmoil over sleeping with gay former husband Sol as the two attempted to pack up their old house together. The guilt is eating away at Sol, too, but he can’t bring himself to come clean when fiancé Robert is found keeled over in the kitchen after a heart attack.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Season 3  starts out with their unabashed openness: Grace and Frankie have started their own business, manufacturing vibrators for the elderly, and they’re not going to let social hang-ups about sex or ageist business practices get in their way.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Season 4 starts in a very different place than it ends up — literally and figuratively. Frankie is living in Santa Fe with her boyfriend, Jacob, and Grace has a new roommate: Sheree. Sheree is a manicurist, but she helps Grace sell the vibrators that Grace created with Frankie. This kind of insertion into Grace’s day-to-day life ruffles Frankie’s feathers, but the three of them work it out without anyone getting too up in arms.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: in Season 5, the best friends feel their time is running out. These time-tested broads recognize how history repeats itself. They know many of life’s moments come back around in one way or another, and the weight of the past can be crushing. Their only twist on Matthew McConaughey’s tortured musings would be that they want the circle to continue; instead of feeling trapped in a constant loop of pain, they’d look for ways to keep things spinning.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie are stunned when their husbands inform them that they want divorces. They're even more stunned when they find out why.

episodes.name: The Credit Cards
episodes.overview: The messy realities of divorce start to sink in for Grace, Frankie, Robert, Sol and their equally frazzled adult children.

episodes.name: The Dinner
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie decide to go back to work. Robert and Sol have an awkward dinner party for their children.

episodes.name: The Funeral
episodes.overview: Emotions run high when a funeral throws Grace, Frankie, Robert and Sol together in public for the first time since the split.

episodes.name: The Fall
episodes.overview: Grace has an eye-opening experience when she goes out for frozen yogurt with Frankie and Briana on a Saturday night.

episodes.name: The Earthquake
episodes.overview: Sol takes care of Frankie after she has an earthquake freak-out, while Grace goes on her first date. Coyote pays Mallory a surprise visit.

episodes.name: The Spelling Bee
episodes.overview: Frankie, Grace and Briana have unexpected encounters when they try new ways to deal with being single.

episodes.name: The Sex
episodes.overview: Frankie takes a new look at her Yam Man Jacob, while Grace and Guy get closer. Bud and Coyote have a brotherly talk. Sol is terrified of Briana.

episodes.name: The Invitation
episodes.overview: Briana tries Frankie's homemade organic beauty product. Robert finds out about Guy and Grace. Frankie tries to set boundaries with Sol.

episodes.name: The Elevator
episodes.overview: After they sign the divorce papers, Frankie, Grace, Sol, Robert and Bud remember a pivotal weekend from five years before.

episodes.name: The Secrets
episodes.overview: Grace tells Frankie a secret that Frankie shares with Sol, setting off multiple arguments in both houses. Briana gets closer with a co-worker.

episodes.name: The Bachelor Party
episodes.overview: Bud and Coyote ask Briana and Mallory to help them throw Sol and Robert's bachelor party. Grace offers to do ANYTHING to cheer up Frankie.

episodes.name: The Vows
episodes.overview: As the wedding day approaches, Grace and Robert have problems expressing themselves, while Sol and Frankie finally clear out their old house.

episodes.name: The Wish
episodes.overview: Sol plans to tell Robert about his betrayal. Frankie is determined to finally separate emotionally from Sol, but events pull her back in.

episodes.name: The Vitamix
episodes.overview: Brianna, Mallory and Bud help Sol deal with wedding details. A visit to Robert and Sol's house brings up strong emotions for Grace and Frankie.

episodes.name: The Negotiation
episodes.overview: Brianna wants to produce Frankie's organic yam lube. Grace competes for her grandchildren's affection. Frankie reconnects with her Yam Man, Jacob.

episodes.name: The Road Trip
episodes.overview: Frankie tracks down Grace's former love Phil on the internet, and the two set off to find him. Tensions arise between Sol and Robert.

episodes.name: The Test
episodes.overview: Frankie has difficulty passing the test to renew her driver's license. Grace attempts to amp up her social life by reconnecting with old friends.

episodes.name: The Chicken
episodes.overview: While Grace mentors a young woman seeking a new career, Frankie has conflicted feelings for Jacob, who wants more than a business relationship.

episodes.name: The Boar
episodes.overview: Grace intervenes after Robert and Sol's big fight. Frankie opens up to Jacob. An online friend request from Phil surprises Grace.

episodes.name: The Anchor
episodes.overview: Frankie has issues with Brianna's ideas for her yam lube and makes a stand. Phil asks Grace out for lunch. Sol tries to work things out with Robert.

episodes.name: The Goodbyes
episodes.overview: Coyote shares some surprising news. Things go awry when Frankie and Sol host a family brunch. Grace must make a difficult decision about Phil.

episodes.name: The Loophole
episodes.overview: Grace and Phil get closer, but complications arise. Sol and Robert square off on opposite sides of the conflict between Frankie and Brianna.

episodes.name: The Bender
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie nurse their emotional wounds: Frankie performs a ritual on the beach, and Grace goes out drinking. Bud and Coyote meet Jacob.

episodes.name: The Party
episodes.overview: As Frankie helps her old friend Babe plan a big bash, she's faced with a troubling decision. Grace tries to make amends to Frankie.

episodes.name: The Coup
episodes.overview: Frankie and Grace receive surprise gifts from Babe that open new horizons for each of them. Sol reveals a long-held secret at Bud's birthday party.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In Season 2 things pick up pretty much right where we left off last year, with Frankie in a guilt-spiraling turmoil over sleeping with gay former husband Sol as the two attempted to pack up their old house together. The guilt is eating away at Sol, too, but he can’t bring himself to come clean when fiancé Robert is found keeled over in the kitchen after a heart attack.

episodes.name: The Art Show
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie try to get a bank loan to help start their new business. Frankie's art show is rife with family tensions and minor dramas.

episodes.name: The Incubator
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie pitch their business plan at a hip startup incubator. Grace fights with Jacob. Sol and Robert play hooky from work.

episodes.name: The Focus Group
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie put together a focus group to test their vibrator prototype, but things go awry. Robert and Sol audition for a play.

episodes.name: The Burglary
episodes.overview: After they're robbed, Frankie is rattled, but Grace has a secret. With Robert in rehearsals and making new friends, Sol feels left out.

episodes.name: The Gun
episodes.overview: Furious about Grace's revelation, Frankie refuses to make up with her. In the wake of his fight with Sol, Robert decides to come out to his mother.

episodes.name: The Pot
episodes.overview: Frankie refuses to go home, and all the kids are dragged into Grace and Frankie's fight. Grace, Brianna and Mallory smoke Frankie's pot together.

episodes.name: The Floor
episodes.overview: The ladies hurt their backs and can’t get off the floor. Coyote looks for a new home. Robert frets over unresolved issues with his mom.

episodes.name: The Alert
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie launch their business, and Bud brings gifts they're reluctant to accept. Sol is upset that Bud wants to fire a longtime employee.

episodes.name: The Apology
episodes.overview: Jacob shares something with Frankie that upsets her. Everyone rallies around Robert when his mother dies. Mallory confides in Brianna.

episodes.name: The Labels
episodes.overview: Sol and Robert pitch in when Grace and Frankie are overwhelmed with orders. Bud is thrown for a loop by his girlfriend’s interest in the Ménage à Moi.

episodes.name: The Other Vibrator
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie send a cease and desist letter to the company that stole their idea. A homophobic church group protests Robert's play rehearsals.

episodes.name: The Musical
episodes.overview: Grace wants Frankie to go to the hospital after a medical incident, but Frankie insists on alternative healing. The protests disrupt Robert's play.

episodes.name: The Sign
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie face a lawsuit. Sol fights back against the homophobic play protesters. Frankie mulls over a move that would change everything.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Season 3  starts out with their unabashed openness: Grace and Frankie have started their own business, manufacturing vibrators for the elderly, and they’re not going to let social hang-ups about sex or ageist business practices get in their way.

episodes.name: The Lodger
episodes.overview: Frankie feels left out of Grace's new friendship with Sheree, her new lodger. Sol and Robert are arrested. Bud and Allison throw a gender-reveal party.

episodes.name: The Scavengender Hunt
episodes.overview: Frankie shares what she discovered about Sheree to a skeptical Grace. Bud sends everyone on a scavenger hunt. Frankie makes a big decision.

episodes.name: The Tappys
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie try to help Sheree get her house back... using both legal and illegal methods. Robert is nominated for a Tappy acting award.

episodes.name: The Expiration Date
episodes.overview: Grace fears her relationship has reached its expiration date. Frankie faces an existential crisis when she learns she's been declared legally dead.

episodes.name: The Pop-Ups
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie hold vibrator pop-up sales at a senior center and a college. Sol and Robert have a disagreement. Bud and Allison hit a roadblock.

episodes.name: The Hinge
episodes.overview: Frankie reconnects with someone important from her past. Despite problems with her knee, Grace refuses to slow down. Robert tries to make amends.

episodes.name: The Landline
episodes.overview: Frankie and Sol have a blast devising a plan to get Frankie declared legally alive again. Grace faces some truths at a funeral she attends with robert.

episodes.name: The Lockdown
episodes.overview: Frankie convinces Allison to have a home birth. Grace and Frankie wind up stuck with a bickering Robert and Sol when there's a neighborhood lockdown.

episodes.name: The Knee
episodes.overview: Nick helps Grace while she's recovering from surgery. Jacob gets upset with Frankie because she wants to spend all their couple time with the baby.

episodes.name: The Death Stick
episodes.overview: Robert and Sol begin therapy. Grace and Frankie get a surprise when they bring gifts to a fan of their vibrators. Brianna's nemesis makes an offer.

episodes.name: The Tub
episodes.overview: Grace hires a contractor to fix an issue at the beach house. Sol's new friendship makes Robert uncomfortable. Frankie gets lost with the baby.

episodes.name: The Rats
episodes.overview: As Grace and Frankie deal with a major disaster in their home, they each keep secrets from other family members. Everyone attends Robert's play.

episodes.name: The Home
episodes.overview: Prompted by their children, Grace and Frankie make a change. Robert and Sol channel some fresh energy into their marriage.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Season 4 starts in a very different place than it ends up — literally and figuratively. Frankie is living in Santa Fe with her boyfriend, Jacob, and Grace has a new roommate: Sheree. Sheree is a manicurist, but she helps Grace sell the vibrators that Grace created with Frankie. This kind of insertion into Grace’s day-to-day life ruffles Frankie’s feathers, but the three of them work it out without anyone getting too up in arms.

episodes.name: The House
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie visit the beach house while their worried kids try to track them down. Robert and Sol are caught in an embarrassing situation.

episodes.name: The Squat
episodes.overview: Refusing to leave the beach house, Grace and Frankie get support from their ex-husbands -- who are having their own issues with an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: The Aide
episodes.overview: Bud convinces Frankie to hire a home health aide. Grace fumes when she learns about Brianna’s changes to Say Grace. Robert hopes to influence Peter.

episodes.name: The Crosswalk
episodes.overview: Grace and Brianna clash at work as Grace faces a tough day. With Joan-Margaret's help, Frankie fights ageism. Peter's casting decision shocks Robert.

episodes.name: The Pharmacy
episodes.overview: An unexpected encounter sparks regret in Grace. Sol acts cagey about his new dog's origins. A stranger's ambush of Coyote leads to a revelation.

episodes.name: The Retreat
episodes.overview: Frankie takes Grace on a girls trip, which isn't exactly the spa retreat Grace was expecting. Mallory goes on a date. An old friend rebuffs Frankie.

episodes.name: The Tremor
episodes.overview: While Frankie worries she's lost her authenticity, Grace frets about Frankie's health. Bud's first meeting with Allison's father goes downhill fast.

episodes.name: The Ceremony
episodes.overview: Robert feels out of place with the younger guys at rehearsals. Grace doesn't like the new man in Frankie's life. Brianna must make a difficult choice.

episodes.name: The Website
episodes.overview: When the Vybrant website goes down, Grace and Frankie must negotiate with a demanding man from Walden Villas. Sol becomes more assertive.

episodes.name: The Highs
episodes.overview: Grace takes extreme measures to keep up her hectic schedule. Sol and Frankie have a disagreement about Coyote. Frankie bonds with Robert over edibles.

episodes.name: The Video
episodes.overview: While Frankie tries to dig herself out of the business mess she created, Grace comes up with a different solution. Brianna goes to bat for Barry.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.overview: Grace returns to town to find that Frankie has everything under control. Bud and Allison's wedding day arrives, but not without some family drama.

episodes.name: The Alternative
episodes.overview: In the wake of their big fight, Grace and Frankie imagine what their lives would be like if they hadn't lived together for the last three years.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: in Season 5, the best friends feel their time is running out. These time-tested broads recognize how history repeats itself. They know many of life’s moments come back around in one way or another, and the weight of the past can be crushing. Their only twist on Matthew McConaughey’s tortured musings would be that they want the circle to continue; instead of feeling trapped in a constant loop of pain, they’d look for ways to keep things spinning.

episodes.name: The Newlyweds
episodes.overview: Frankie is stunned by Grace's news, but she buries her feelings -- until everyone gathers together to send off Bud and Allison.

episodes.name: The Rescue
episodes.overview: While Frankie tries to adjust to living alone, Grace arranges a family dinner that takes an awkward turn. Robert and Sol plan a honeymoon trip.

episodes.name: The Trophy Wife
episodes.overview: Grace's insecurities flare at a lavish fundraiser, where Frankie gets swept up in a silent auction. Sol hosts a game night to distract a worried Robert.

episodes.name: The Funky Walnut
episodes.overview: Robert and Sol grapple with a health scare, while Grace's bad knee sparks a new business idea. Coyote connects with Bud's ex-girlfriend.

episodes.name: The Confessions
episodes.overview: Grace worries that Nick isn't satisfied with their sex life. Sol decides to keep his diagnosis a secret, and Coyote comes clean about Jessica.

episodes.name: The Bad Hearer
episodes.overview: Robert's fussing irritates Sol. Barry presses Brianna and Mallory to make up. Frankie's date with Jack inspires a marketing strategy for the Rise Up.

episodes.name: The Surprises
episodes.overview: Grace wants to leverage Jack's celebrity connections... and Sol and Robert realize they've met him before. Bud tries to prove he's over Jessica.

episodes.name: The Short Rib
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie introduce Jack to Nick, hoping they can all go on vacation together. Meanwhile, Barry finally gets his short-rib double date.

episodes.name: The One-At-A-Timing
episodes.overview: Frankie's enjoying having two men in her life, but Grace warns her it won't end well. Allison and Sol encourage Bud to get a DNA test.

episodes.name: The Scent
episodes.overview: Grace's plan for a relaxing spa day backfires. Frankie tries to find Joan-Margaret a husband. Robert hosts a fundraiser to save the community theater.

episodes.name: The Laughing Stock
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie prepare for their pitch, but their prototype is missing. Robert keeps a secret from Sol. Brianna gets an appealing offer.

episodes.name: The Tank
episodes.overview: Grace's loyalties are tested as she and Frankie face the Sharks. Robert scrambles to recoup the money he donated. Bud meets his long-lost cousin.

episodes.name: The Change
episodes.overview: Grace tries to make amends to Frankie, Sol gives Robert a taste of his own medicine, and Brianna and Barry reach a turning point in their relationship.

episodes.name: The Roomies
episodes.overview: With their exes living at the beach house and FBI agents who arrested Nick sniffing around, Grace and Frankie frantically search for the money they hid.

episodes.name: The Arraignment
episodes.overview: While Frankie retrieves the cash, Grace and Nick discuss their marriage at his arraignment. Joan-Margaret hatches a plan for laundering the money.

episodes.name: The Bunny
episodes.overview: Bud tries to soothe discord at the beach house by throwing a brunch for the two families. But revelations from the past create even more hard feelings.

episodes.name: The Circumcision
episodes.overview: Nick has a chance to get out of jail, but Grace likes things the way they are. An old acquaintance helps Frankie with the money laundering.

episodes.name: The Raccoon
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie adjust to their new housemate, Robert and Sol join the neighborhood watch, and Brianna reveals too much when she meets Barry’s parents.

episodes.name: The Wire
episodes.overview: The ladies try to help Nick reduce his sentence by implicating his partner. Sol attempts to catch a thief while Mallory establishes dominance at work.

episodes.name: The Psychic
episodes.overview: Grace and Frankie scramble to keep their friend Arlene from being moved into memory care. Nick gets in the way of Coyote's romantic plans.

episodes.name: The Bonida Bandidas
episodes.overview: Brianna and Mallory work with a conflict mediator who doesn't exactly have a great track record. Grace and Frankie try to smuggle drugs out of Mexico.

episodes.name: The Prediction
episodes.overview: Grace gets a distressing phone call that has Frankie questioning the future. Sol worries that Robert is experiencing memory loss.

episodes.name: The Panic Attacks
episodes.overview: After a trip to the ER, Frankie takes Grace to a therapist. Brianna brainstorms her next move and Coyote hits a snag in his marriage plans.

episodes.name: The Horrible Family
episodes.overview: Frankie decides to celebrate every annual holiday and special occasion in rapid succession. Grace finds a shocking connection to a rising politician.

episodes.name: The Casino
episodes.overview: The ladies don disguises and head to a casino to spy on Coyote. Brianna also pretends to be someone she's not to appease a potential investor.

episodes.name: The Last Hurrah
episodes.overview: Coyote confirms Allison's suspicion that Bud is lying to her. Grace goes after Nick for his tell-all book. Frankie seeks a happy ending of her own.

episodes.name: The Paprikash
episodes.overview: Grace craves a comforting dish from her childhood, but only her estranged brother has the recipe. Sol and Peter team up to blackmail a theater critic.

episodes.name: The Fake Funeral
episodes.overview: Frankie throws herself a funeral, leaving Grace to attend an important meeting alone. To Brianna's annoyance, her family rallies around Barry.

episodes.name: The Beginning
episodes.overview: Robert finally comes to terms with his memory loss. Grace and Frankie confront the possibility of immediate death — or aging for a few more years.
